description.value:
Consumable (Ammunition)

When triggered, this enhanced vapor projector ammunition produces a burst of flame in a line 15 feet long and 5 feet wide or a 15-foot cone. A single fuel tank holds enough fuel for three attacks in a line or a single attack in a cone. Each creature must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking [[/r 3d8]] fire damage or half as much on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners. It ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

Â 

Projector tank, incendiary

When triggered, this vapor projector ammunition produces a burst of flame in a line 15 feet long and 5 feet wide or a 15-foot cone. A single fuel tank holds enough fuel for three attacks in a line or a single attack in a cone. Each creature must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking [[/r 2d8]] fire damage or half as much on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners. It ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.
